member.name: T:Enterprise.Calculations.Calculation`1
member.summary: Represents a generic calculation with a result and a predefined status.
member.typeparam: The type of the result of the calculation.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Calculations.Calculation`1.Result
member.summary: Gets the result of the calculation.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Calculations.Calculation`1.Status
member.summary: Gets the status of the calculation.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Calculations.Calculation`1.Reason
member.summary: A detailed reason that explains the status.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Calculations.Calculation`1.Exception
member.summary: Gets the exception that occurred when the calculation was made (if applicable).

member.name: P:Enterprise.Calculations.Calculation`1.DateCompleted
member.summary: The date and time the calculation was made.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Calculations.Calculation`1.WasSuccessful
member.summary: Indicates whether the calculation was successful.

member.name: F:Enterprise.Calculations.CalculationStatus.Failed
member.summary: The calculation did not complete successfully. This is typically due to an exception.
